Oh, great. Here's a fridge. The fridge contains a raw pork chop, an orange bell pepper, a parsley and a yellow bell pepper. You can see an oven. You scan the room, seeing a table. On the table you see a knife. You make out a counter. On the counter you can see a raw yellow potato, a red apple and a cookbook. You see a stove! But the thing is empty. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the stove.
